title: 61  Nam June Paik, TV Dream/Dream TV, 1963
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">61  
Nam June Paik (American, born Korea, 1932–2006)  
TV Dream/Dream TV  
1963  
Graphite on ivory wove laid paper, laid down on black card; 53.3 × 63.5 cm (21 × 25 in.)  
Gift of the Irving Stenn Jr. Drawings Collection in honor of Mark Pascale, 2014.1387

</section><section id="figures">Nam June Paik, TV Dream/Dream TV, 1963.
